title: SET_BOAT_ANCHOR
content:
0x75DBEC174AEEAD100xA3906284// SetBoatAnchor
void SET_BOAT_ANCHOR(Vehicle boat, BOOL toggle);Parameters:boat: The target boat.toggle: Set the anchor state true deploys the anchor, false raises it.Sets the anchor state for a boat.NativeDB Introduced: v323Note: You might want to check if you can use your anchor before with CAN_ANCHOR_BOAT_HERE.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#local boat = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if not boat or not IsThisModelABoat(GetEntityModel(boat)) then return end

-- Check if we can anchor the boat here
if CanAnchorBoatHere(boat) then
    -- Deploy the boat's anchor
    SetBoatAnchor(boat, true)
    
    -- Wait for 10 seconds
    Wait(10000)
    
    -- Raise the boat's anchor
    SetBoatAnchor(boat, false)
else
    print("Cannot anchor the boat at this location")
end
codeBlocks:
// SetBoatAnchor
void SET_BOAT_ANCHOR(Vehicle boat, BOOL toggle);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SET_BOAT_ANCHOR
SetBoatAnchor(vehicle, true)
